profile.profileDescription: Profile in May 2013 by Alison Langmead and Julia Weist

label.name: Specifies the source of the metadata for the item.

label.name_singular: THIS LIST TO BE ACTUALIZED AS RELATIONSHIP TYPES FOR CA_COLLECTIONS_X_CA_ENTITIES.
label.name_plural: THIS LIST TO BE ACTUALIZED AS RELATIONSHIP TYPES FOR CA_COLLECTIONS_X_CA_ENTITIES.

label.name_singular: THIS LIST TO BE ACTUALIZED AS RELATIONSHIP TYPES FOR CA_COLLECTIONS_X_CA_PLACES.
label.name_plural: THIS LIST TO BE ACTUALIZED AS RELATIONSHIP TYPES FOR CA_COLLECTIONS_X_CA_PLACES.

label.name: Event date types (potentially unnecessary if display date does the job)

label.name_singular: POTENTIALLY UNNECESSARY; FILL IN TYPES (like start or end)
label.name_plural: POTENTIALLY UNNECESSARY; FILL IN TYPES (like start or end)

label.name: Movement date types (potentially unnecessary if display date does the job)

label.name_singular: POTENTIALLY UNNECESSARY; FILL IN TYPES (like start or end)
label.name_plural: POTENTIALLY UNNECESSARY; FILL IN TYPES (like start or end)

label.name_singular: THIS LIST TO BE ACTUALIZED AS RELATIONSHIP TYPES FOR CA_ENTITIES_X_CA_ENTITIES.
label.name_plural: THIS LIST TO BE ACTUALIZED AS RELATIONSHIP TYPES FOR CA_ENTITIES_X_CA_ENTITIES.

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Cultural Context
label.description: The name of the culture, people (ethnonym), or adjectival form of a country name from which a Work, Collection, or Image originates, or the cultural context with which the Work, Collection, or Image has been associated.

label.name: Date
label.description: Date or range of dates associated with the creation, design, production, presentation, performance, construction, or alteration, etc. of the work or image. Dates may be expressed as free text or numerical. The boolean circa attribute may be added to either subelement to indicate an approximate date. For image records, the date element refers to the view date, if known. See CCO Chapter 4: Stylistic and Chronological Information for a more thorough discussion of dates.

label.name: Indexing date
label.description: Enter ranges simply as 1922-1935 (66 BCE-22 BCE; 30 BCE-10 CE). Enter "ca." dates as the date displayed +/- 5 years (i.e., "ca. 1545" becomes "1540-1560"). Enter specific dates as 01-JUN-1955 (15-MAR-44 BCE).

label.name: Description
label.description: A free-text note about the Work, Collection, or Image, including comments, description, or interpretation, that gives additional information not recorded in other categories. For element-specific notes, use the optional notes subelement.

label.name: Inscription
label.description: All marks or written words added to the object at the time of production or in its subsequent history, including signatures, dates, dedications, texts, and colophons, as well as marks, such as the stamps of silversmiths, publishers, or printers.

label.name: Location refID
label.description: The refID and refID type associated with a location. This is where accession numbers go.

label.name: Material
label.description: The substance of which a work or an image is composed.

label.name: Measurement
label.description: The physical size, shape, scale, dimensions, or format of the Work or Image. Dimensions may include such measurements as volume, weight, area or running time.

label.name: Measurement (linear distance only)
label.description: This field takes only length/width measures. No punctuation is needed for the units (i.e., "22 in" or "33 m").

label.name: Measurement (besides linear distance)
label.description: All other types of measurements should go in this field.

label.name: Rights
label.description: Information about the copyright status and the rights holder for a work, collection, or image. The optional notes sub-element may include any justifications, conditions, or restraints on use, contact or licensing information, or other intellectual property statements as may be desired.

label.name: Source
label.description: A reference to the source of the information recorded about the work or the image. For a work record, this may be a citation to the sole source of the information recorded in a catalog record. For an image, it may be used to provide information about the supplying agency, vendor or individual.

label.name: Local refID (usually page numbers)
label.description: Enter page numbers here ("p. 26"). Enter figure numbers if necessary ("p. 26, fig. 3")

label.name: State/Edition
label.description: The identifying number and/or name assigned to the state or edition of a work that exists in more than one form and the placement of that work in the context of prior or later issuances of multiples of the same work.

label.name: State/Edition Name
label.description: Such as "1st State"

label.name: Style/Period
label.description: A defined style, historical period, group, school, dynasty, movement, etc. whose characteristics are represented in the Work or Image.

label.name: Subject Type (Use for Subject Headings Only)
label.description: If the list item is a subject, use one of the following lists to designate what type. Note, locations and agents should be related as subject from the place and entity authorities.

label.name: Technique
label.description: The production or manufacturing processes, techniques, and methods incorporated in the fabrication or alteration of the work or image.

label.name: Textual Reference (TextRef)
label.description: Contains the name of a related textual reference and any type of unique identifier that text assigns to a Work or Collection that is independent of any repository.

label.name: Authority/Vocabulary Reference
label.description: The name of the controlled vocabulary and the particular reference ID associated with this entry.

label.name: Work Type
label.description: Identifies the specific type of Work, Collection or Image being described in the record. Repeat for all applicable terms.

label.name: Introduction
label.description: Narrative description for tour. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the tour.

label.name: Introduction
label.description: Narrative description for tour stop. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the stop.

label.name: Tour Stop Date
label.description: Date or range of dates associated with a tour stop.

label.name: Indexing date(s)
label.description: Enter ranges simply as 1922-1935 (66 BCE-22 BCE; 30 BCE-10 CE). Enter "ca." dates as the date displayed +/- 5 years (i.e., "ca. 1545" becomes "1540-1560"). Enter specific dates as 01-JUN-1955 (15-MAR-44 BCE).

label.name: Movement Date
label.description: Date or range of dates associated with an object movement.

label.name: Indexing date(s)
label.description: Enter ranges simply as 1922-1935 (66 BCE-22 BCE; 30 BCE-10 CE). Enter "ca." dates as the date displayed +/- 5 years (i.e., "ca. 1545" becomes "1540-1560"). Enter specific dates as 01-JUN-1955 (15-MAR-44 BCE).

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item.

label.name: Location Extent
label.description: The extent associated with a location. The drop-down menu is populated with pre-existing values in the field.

label.name: Agent Life Date
label.description: A life date associated with a location (even if unknown), such as birth, death, illness, etc...

label.name: Indexing date(s)
label.description: Enter ranges simply as 1922-1935 (66 BCE-22 BCE; 30 BCE-10 CE). Enter "ca." dates as the date displayed +/- 5 years (i.e., "ca. 1545" becomes "1540-1560"). Enter specific dates as 01-JUN-1955 (15-MAR-44 BCE).

label.name: Agent Institutional Affiliation Set
label.description: Describes an affiliation with an organization, time-delimited.

label.name: Indexing date(s)
label.description: Enter ranges simply as 1922-1935 (66 BCE-22 BCE; 30 BCE-10 CE). Enter "ca." dates as the date displayed +/- 5 years (i.e., "ca. 1545" becomes "1540-1560"). Enter specific dates as 01-JUN-1955 (15-MAR-44 BCE).

label.name: Agent Personal Affiliation Set
label.description: Describes an affiliation with another person, time-delimited.

label.name: Indexing date(s)
label.description: Enter ranges simply as 1922-1935 (66 BCE-22 BCE; 30 BCE-10 CE). Enter "ca." dates as the date displayed +/- 5 years (i.e., "ca. 1545" becomes "1540-1560"). Enter specific dates as 01-JUN-1955 (15-MAR-44 BCE).

label.name: Agent Life Role Set
label.description: Describes the role an agent took on in their life, time-delimited.

label.name: Indexing date(s)
label.description: Enter ranges simply as 1922-1935 (66 BCE-22 BCE; 30 BCE-10 CE). Enter "ca." dates as the date displayed +/- 5 years (i.e., "ca. 1545" becomes "1540-1560"). Enter specific dates as 01-JUN-1955 (15-MAR-44 BCE).

label.name: Agent Gender
label.description: The gender of the agent.

label.name: Agent Extent and/or Attribution
label.description: Enter here any "Attribution" or "Extent" information such as, "School of" or "Only worked on the flowers." If more than one agent is associated with this record, be clear about which agent is being addressed by your notes in this field.

label.name: Event Date
label.description: Date or range of dates associated with either a contextual event or a time/place-specific event. Reminder: these events are not initiated by the persistence narrative of an entity, object or site.

label.name: Indexing date(s)
label.description: Enter ranges simply as 1922-1935 (66 BCE-22 BCE; 30 BCE-10 CE). Enter "ca." dates as the date displayed +/- 5 years (i.e., "ca. 1545" becomes "1540-1560"). Enter specific dates as 01-JUN-1955 (15-MAR-44 BCE).

label.name: Collection-Entity Interaction Set
label.description: Describes an interaction between an entity and a collection, time-delimited.

label.name: Indexing date(s)
label.description: Enter ranges simply as 1922-1935 (66 BCE-22 BCE; 30 BCE-10 CE). Enter "ca." dates as the date displayed +/- 5 years (i.e., "ca. 1545" becomes "1540-1560"). Enter specific dates as 01-JUN-1955 (15-MAR-44 BCE).

label.name: Collection Location Set
label.description: Describes an interaction between an place and a collection, time-delimited.

label.name: Indexing date(s)
label.description: Enter ranges simply as 1922-1935 (66 BCE-22 BCE; 30 BCE-10 CE). Enter "ca." dates as the date displayed +/- 5 years (i.e., "ca. 1545" becomes "1540-1560"). Enter specific dates as 01-JUN-1955 (15-MAR-44 BCE).

label.name: Collection Date
label.description: Date or range of dates associated with a collection of objects.

label.name: Indexing date(s)
label.description: Enter ranges simply as 1922-1935 (66 BCE-22 BCE; 30 BCE-10 CE). Enter "ca." dates as the date displayed +/- 5 years (i.e., "ca. 1545" becomes "1540-1560"). Enter specific dates as 01-JUN-1955 (15-MAR-44 BCE).

label.name: Source refID
label.description: The refID and refID type associated with a source.

label.name: Indexing date(s)
label.description: Enter ranges simply as 1922-1935 (66 BCE-22 BCE; 30 BCE-10 CE). Enter "ca." dates as the date displayed +/- 5 years (i.e., "ca. 1545" becomes "1540-1560"). Enter specific dates as 01-JUN-1955 (15-MAR-44 BCE).

label.name: Format
label.description: The file format or physical medium or dimensions of the resource.

label.name: Languages
label.description: A language of the resource.

label.name: Type
label.description: The nature or genre of the resource.

label.name: Indexing date
label.description: Enter ranges simply as 1922-1935 (66 BCE-22 BCE; 30 BCE-10 CE). Enter "ca." dates as the date displayed +/- 5 years (i.e., "ca. 1545" becomes "1540-1560"). Enter specific dates as 01-JUN-1955 (15-MAR-44 BCE).
